decision_conditions: The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.

<p class="MsoNormal" style="">As per the submitted drawing(s) the proposed rooflights shall, as far as is possible, be flush with the roofslope
(conservation grade rooflights).</p>
Reason - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Front porch; hardstanding in front garden; part demolition and alteration of attached garage; first floor rear extensions; alteration and extension to roof to raise eaves and ridge height; two rear dormers; rooflights; rear patio; external alterations
